description: Gets out of your way and just works. If I could get foliate to run for cbz format I read comics and books all in one place
This is everything the Gnome e-book reader should be. I have often found the Gnome offering to be a bit clunky and awkward. This app is fluid, smooth and intuitive. Highly recommended by me.
summary: What Gnome e-book reader should aspire to

description:
i really like the design of this application - i've been using it for a few months and it's nearly everything you would want for a gnome book reader. the dealbreaker it that it's dreadfully slow. it works okay on most normal books, but if you ever open something more than a thousand pages or so it lags to the point that it becomes unusable. as someone who mainly uses ereaders for cookbooks this it a total dealbreaker.

i'm aware there are plans to add a new rendering engine, which hopefully should improve things. as of now, it's just not cutting it.
Has just what I need and not a lot of useless or intrusive frills.
summary: Quickly became my favorite ebook reader

description: This is amazing. The customization options allow me to be able to read more easily, and the dictionary is very helpful!! Although right now I need to convert most of my PDFs to epub which isn't too great. Would also love to see a GTK4 port!
Keeps on crashing when i try to change the theme.
It is simple and excellent. I like it. It has all functionality I need.
Latest version no longer opens epub files on Debian 11
What a nice GNOME app! Thanks!
Superb app for reading books in linux
summary: Superb app for reading books in linux

description: Great app, exactly what I was looking for, clear and light
summary: Great app, exactly what I was looking for, clear and light

description: A simple Ebook reader that fits nicely with the GNOME desktop. Sane defaults with a good enough selection of customization options to tweak.
summary: Just about the right amount of Features

description:
It's a quite pleasant experience. But as other have already noted, there's an issue with app's fonts. File's fonts looks alright, but app's interface's fonts are all messed up and ugly.
Also, it'd be really nice if you can add an option to customize dictionaries. Like, add an option to use any online dictionary user prefer. This feature is available in the app called Moon Reader in Android and it's super useful.
Foliate is really a hidden gem in snap store. Its scrolling design is much better than FBreader and Bookworm.
Reader app I was looking for!
It's a great little app for ebooks.
summary: Great UI and attention to detail. Please keep working on it!

description: a nice little app for reading my ebook selection, thanks!
Nice, well looking and well thought through book reader. Absolutely love it!

Flatpak?

When will we get it on regular repos in .deb package.
Polished and well thought interface, fast and with the features you would expect of a modern e-book reader. Excellent work and lets hope the work continues
summary: The e-book reader the GNU/Linux desktop experience needed!

description: Pretty, lightweight, packed with all the features one expect from an e-Book reader.
This is an outstanding application. I hope Wayland support gets better, as there are sometimes visual glitches in maximized mode (as for July 2019).
Does just what it should just the way it should, looks amazing and nice to use! Thanks for such a nice app!

The reading experience of an e-book with Foliate is very pleasant, because of the clear interface and the smooth changing of the pages.
Also it hasn' shown, at least for me, any type of glitch or bug while displaying different epub ebooks, in contrast to what used to happen with GNOME Books, and i think it could be nice if Foliate could also allow the reading of PDF e-books.
Loved it. Even if it is a flatpack, it integrates with the system theme unlike some other flatpack apps.
Efficient, beautiful, and fast reader for many formats. Has many features like highlighting and goes above and beyond.
summary: The best ebook reader ive ever used

description: I cannot open an e-book file... and configuration items do nothing.

It is very good, not all the softwares let you underline ane
and save your annotation to then export them on anothrer file@
Leve, eficiente e com ótimas funções.
It is esay to use
this is 7/11/2019 there is a problem, it can't open epub files, i am using ubuntu 19.10 i just install it
One of the best looking ebook reader apps out there and do recommend to any Gnome-desktop enthusiast or anyone looking for a nice epub reader for PC
No network drive access, no USB flashdrive access
Finally an ebook reader that just work with a nice (yet not perfect) interface
Exactly what I was looking for!
I was surprised to see this quality of an app for Ubuntu, honestly. Keep up the great work, this became a standard to me!
Best E-Book reader. Would've wished it on Windows too
I have not used it yet to review, because I can't open my files. You should move your documents to home directory in order to access it from this app
I get this error: "Oh no !. The file could not be opened", when trying to open PDF file on Ubuntu 19.10
Can we pay you a beer?
Great app for reading Epub.
Best ebook reader for linux!
It feels like iBook!
.deb package is there. it is called ' com.github.johnfactotum.foliate_2.0.0_all.deb'. This can be installed with software cetre.
Does everything a simple eBook reader app needs to, and does it fairly well.
summary: Looks great, reasonably snappy, my favorite eBook reader on Linux

description: A very minimalistic and beautiful e-book reader.

Simple eBook reader,
with just the right features.

Distraction free default,
intuitive color themes (with option for custom theme)

Realistic shadow mode is nice,
but, would be nicer with a page turn animation in that mode.

tested with epub format.
The most satisfying ebook reader I've ever found on PC
One of the best ebook apps on any platform.
Foliate has beautiful interface, just right amount of features and very practical keyboard shortcuts and mouse gestures. Highly recommended.
Great app. Has all the features I was looking from an ebook reading app. Well done devs!

It is simple ebook reader but numbers of features.
Thanks for great ...
?

Anyone has got an idea why it takes like 1 minute to load an 800kb .mobi ebook?

Anyway I really like the app overall.
summary: Great app, but a bit laggy..

description: Its not working for Ubuntu 20.04
nice modern look and feel will definitely prefer for ebooks. However it does not read PDF files. I would have loved a single universal reader with the ability to set sepia background.
And has an amazing UI
Beautiful interface which enhances the reading experience with simple, useful and intuitive features. Wish all software was designed with this level of care and attention to the user experience.

Thank you, really love it.
Has lags while window is resizing, but it's ok.
Pretty good app

I don't found .pdf , .djvu ... formats
it's a huge lack . but every thing else is awsome. I recommend foliate
Love the customization and theming Foliate offers!
that`s very good
Beatiful, Easy to use.
...It opens fb2.zip books very slowly.
No other e-book reader come closer to foliate. Foliate does not provide e-book manager or any other unnecessary feature. It is just a reader which open when you click a book from file manager.
Good GUI and nice themes make for a pleasant reading experience
I believe that this is a perfect replacement for Calibre's default viwer.
Foliate's interface and features surpasses other ebook reader on Linux by a thousand mile. Must have app for book lovers.
summary: The Best Ebook Reader for Linux Desktop

description: I really like it, works like a charm.

It's great, really clean and good looking. The only problem I found was the dictionary that sometimes doesn't work when you click on some word inside its own interface (for example when you look the definition of a stressed word and there's the link to the infinitive, but ,when you click, the dictionary doesn't find it)
summary: One of the nicest so far, but can improve

description: I loved it gonna use it as default. Please keep it updating we love it. very excited
add dark mode though....... through put the app
summary: great app.... organising features are sufficient enough

description:
It's UI is very nice.
Gnome developers should learn something from this app.

Clearly very simple. This code base is a rock solid little app though, it looks very nice in Gnome and works well, just very much not feature rich.

If this was forked into something else with more feature add-ins, it could be extremely viable.
summary: Tons of potential for best E-Reader

description: Great little app. I love the possibility to customize highlight colours.
Clean and clear interface. I love it
summary: Everything you need to read books

description:
I've been searching for a simple ePUB reader for the desktp for some time*. Finally, it arrives as Foliate. With a clean, modern user interface and focusing on one task: reading books, it fits the bill perfectly.

* Calibre is disqualified, as it modifies your ePUB files!
* At time of writing, GNOME Books still doesn't read ePUB files.
Simple and easy to use. Best looking ebook reader I have used so far. Thank you
summary: Simple, clean and gets the job done

description: The best ebook reader on Linux. the most accurate formatting of epubs and it can show the two page format better than others.
Would recommend
I like the app design, bonus point for brightness setting and also bookmark settings.
indeed, amazing app!
very easy to use and simple ui
Works seamlessly with Gnome.
Really nice looking app. A bit slow with big ebooks.

Does not render properly most of the thousands of epub books you can download from archive.org (you can see first page and last page, but nothing in-between). "Next Page" does not work. "Hidden Menu/Toolbar" is mostly just annoying. The bad far outweighs the good.
I think this is the best eBook viewer for linux and you should try it.
I love it! It is time to add features to read pdfs.
calibre works great on Window, foliate work amazing on Ubuntu. I installed calibre, it freezes out on linux. The performance is ok, I open textbook had 600+ pages, it takes some time.
summary: This is the best Ebook reader for Ubuntu

description: I want to be able to switch views and scroll though a book with subheading that would be nice like Ibooks.
summary: a little buggy needs more features

description: Very good app for reading epub and mobi files. There may be more to explore.
Grateful to the developer.
summary: Way better than any other desktop ebook readers I used

description: This app has come a long way from past ePub readers for linux. It has a clean and helpful interface, and in my opinion is far superior to even iBooks on the mac since it is so so much faster.
summary: An incredible and fast app for reading ebooks

description: Great app for book reading
layout and customization options are excellent. Translation integration works perfectly.
summary: very nice ebook reader for epub

description: I love this app, fresh and simple base for reading using your Gnome Desktop
Beautiful simple yet powerful app. Great for taking notes with the highlight feature. Would give 5 stars if the scrolling view mode was smoother, but it's super choppy most of the time
I love how it fills up the screen, full focus.
Amazingly clean.
It works so well, Before this app I installed and removed several non working apps. Thank you for your effort!
Öffnet sowohl epub als auch mobi, alles was ich brauche!
Super app kann ich ganz empfehlen.
Somebody must be positively insane.
summary: An eBook Reader as an 1.7 GB Download?

description: Ein wirklich gelungenes Programm. Top
Einfach zu Bedienen, ansprechende Optik und hat alle Features, welche ich benötige.
The App is really sleak and beautiful, sadly the app crashes if I try to switch to dark mode
Excelente, con una interface sencilla.
Simple y perfecta, el estilo negro hace que sea menos fatiga visual al momento de leer
Sencilla y con un buen diseño.
El placer de la lectura llevado a su máxima expresión. Gracias a quien quiera que haya colaborado en el desarrollo de esta herramienta.

El paquete de snap o de flathub me dio muchos errores en ubuntu ademas de que no se integra con el tema que tengas. Recomiendo totalmente descargar el .deb que esta en los releases de github de foliate https://github.com/johnfactotum/foliate/releases
summary: La aplicación es muy buena pero no la descarguen desde aquí

description: Desde la última actualización, se ve sencillamente genial. Su apariencia es absolutamente hermosa y cómoda, además de ajustarse perfectamente a cualquier tamaño de pantalla

Es una aplicación muy buena para leer libros (aunque estaría bien que hubiera dispositivos para la lectura con Linux). Pero encima tiene acceso a los catálogos de libros libres, incluyendo libros en muchos idiomas. Me ha parecido excepcional.

Después de mucho buscar por fin encontré una aplicación para leer epubs sin complicaciones, la interfaz muy limpia y las opciones de configuración son suficientes por lo menos para lo que yo buscaba y necesito cuando solo leo un libro. Leo mucho en ipad pero con esta aplicación Linux se ha convertido en una muy buena opción para leer. Excelente!!
y si ws ciwro sencillo pero potente y amigable... la recomiendo mucho si la usas en tu computadora y sobre todo si usas openstagerc de linux que tiene Arch lo hace de una manera increible... gracias.
summary: Foliate es el visor de libros mas versatil y pequeño que he visto

description: La aplicación tiene un diseño muy limpio y elegante por lo que es fácil enfocarse en la lectura, ademas cuenta con funciones adicionales que sirven de gran utilidad para la misma, como la búsqueda, el resaltado, entre otras. Recomendada.
summary: muy elegante y simple, con las funciones para una buena lectura

description: Muy buena, y con una opcion muy buena para ver las imagenes que se encuentran en el archivo de lectura, solo das click en la imagen y aparece una nueva ventana con la imagen, gran opcion, justo lo que estaba buscando.
Genial snap,interface limia,intuitiva,moderna y linda;guncionamiento fluido,zero problemas;una gran experiencia de uso;OJALÁ TODAS LAS SNAPS FUERAN ASÍ DE BUENAS!

Me gustaría que integran también la opción de leer .PDF, no sé por qué siempre lo dejanpor fuera, sería bien que al tener acceso a la parte de la biblioteca se vieran todos los libros en los diferentes formatos, entre los más conocidos, .PDF, .ePub, .MOBI y así sucesivamente. Del resto, nada que criticar.
Me parece super cool poder aprender C en un ebook.
Excelente aplicación para leer, gestionar y descargar libros... muy recomendada
Estuve una aplicacion como esta por horas... no sé por qué me costó encontrarla. Pero al fin la tengo. ¡Gracias!
No abre ningún libro en epub de los 70 que tengo descargados

Minimalista, ligera, compacta y funciona con .mobi.

Muchas gracias al equipo desarrollador :D :D

******************

Minimalist, light , small and it works with mobi file types.

Thanks a lot to the dev team :D :D
por alguna razon calibre no me funciona pero esta si y es muy buena
LO busque por las buenas opiniones, pero no funcionó como esperaba, y ahora no lo puedo quitar de mi equipo.
summary: No funciona y peor aún no se puede desinstalar

description:
Un software para gestionar nuestra biblioteca que funciona muy bien. Un gran programa, bonito y últil.
Puede que no tan completo y exaustivo como Calibre. Pero muy funcional y práctico.

Hola me gusta le estética de la aplicación, me encantaría poder agregar más de un libro a la vez, sería genial que desarrollaran un motor de texto a voz eficiente, rapido y que no tenga la voz robotica que parece que a ningún otro programa le parece importar
summary: delicado, estetico pero escaso en funcionalidades

description: Un lector de ebooks muy cómodo y fácil de usar
Tiene muchas funcionalidades genial. Mis dieces.
Sensishito y caristmático.
Cuenta con modo oscuro y eso le suma muchos punto.
Me funciona a la perfección.
Leer en una pantalla de ordenador no suele ser buena idea, pero si hay que hacerlo la verdad es que Foliate es la mejor aplicación que he encontrado. Con diferencia ;)
Este era mi lector favorito en otra distro pero en Ubuntu el texto no aparece suavizado sino que se ve como en los tiempos de Windows 3.11: Con bordes duros y pixeleados que lo hacen difícil de leer.

La instale y empece a añadir a foliate, los epub que tengo en mi biblioteca. La cosa pintaba bastante bien hasta que me di cuenta de que ciertos ebooks no se alojan en dicho programa. No se a que se debe esto, pero tras muchos intentos, el resultado seguia siendo el mismo, habia unos ebooks que no se alojan en foliate. Si alguien es capaz de explicarme a que se debe esto me resultaria de bastante utilidad.
Parfait pour moi, très bon logiciel, stable et pratique.
Devrait garder le format de la fenêtre du livre ouvert en dernier, toujours obliger de redimensionner. Se ferme au changement de fond. et de luminosité. Autrement simple d'utilisation.
Franchement bien foutu. Ce qu'il faut, interface claire, un beau boulot.

Superbe liseuse.

Awesome reader.
Le meilleur logiciel pour la lecture d'epubs, merci !

Encore quelques problèmes, notamment concernant le zoom (qui ne marche pas trop chez moi) ainsi que l'affichage hidpi (qui marche parfaitement, tant qu'on essaye pas de jouer avec les effets de luminosité, ce qui rend tout flou) ; mais cette application est vraiment super
Только нужный функционал, ничего лишнего. Пользуюсь только книгами в формате epub, поэтому про поддержку других форматов не знаю.
Программа для чтения очень удобна за исключением одного момента - не запоминает страницу на которой закрыл книгу!
Можно поставить свой opds.Для русскоязычных это конечно же "Флибуста".И флибустьерить наплевав на авторские права владельцев книг как капитан Джек Воробей.
Отлично интегрируется с голосовыми движками, я себе Артемия Лебедева поставил (не нравится как человек, но как голос в читалке просто топ)
Очень крутая читалка. Намного удобнее fbreader. Единственный минус, не читает fb2 и fb3

Открывает ePub как на "родных" устройствах Apple. Форматирование текста и отображение картинок правильное. Рад, что в Linux есть подобные приложения!
Ставил из Snap Store.
Весьма удобная читалка, а главное работает без косяков. Еще бы читала fb2, цены бы ей не было.
Тут кто-то писал, что не читает fb2. Так вот, в текущей версии этот формат открывается.
summary: Отличное приложение, открывает все нужные форматы

description: Версия 2.4 уже и fb2 читает.
Даже в окнах нет такого удобного приложения
Удобный интерфейс, давно искал такую читалку. Жаль что нельзя администрировать по жанрам/или другой классификации по локальным каталогам ПК.
Отличная читалка.
Даже поиск по тексту есть!
Выглядит не плохо. Не читает fb2. Легкая.
summary: Выглядит не плохо. Не читает fb2

description: everything is working ok
fb2 открывает, а вот обложки не показывает :(
Очень удобно читать электронные книги на компьютере. Отличная функция просмотра изображений.

Замечательное приложение, открывает все нужные форматы, очень удобное. 

Неплохо бы еще конечно PDF добавить.
Прекрасная читалка
Work's pretty well.

Удобная читалка. Очень понравилось, что можно полностью настроить под свои нужды и при этом сохранить в виде разных профилей, например, для улицы, для дома и для ночного чтения. Отмечу также возможность задать, помимо всего прочего, максимальную ширину страницы, что удобно для чтения на экранах разной ширины. Единственный фатальный недостаток - приложение запускается через раз. То есть буквально только каждый второй раз. Приходится открыть, закрыть, снова открыть. Возможно это дело не в приложении, а в книге, которую я сейчас читаю, но пока отклонений от этого правила не было - открываю каждый раз по два раза.

Читаю книгу fb2 и не верю своим глазам. Читает! А еще можно делать закладки, свои комментарии к ним и сохранять их от дельным файлом, а потом, например на другом компе, импортировать и продолжать работу над книгой.
Почти не глючит.

Отличная читалка, для тех кто привык читать в AlReader на Win. 
 Удобно, быстро заметки ставить, переводчик под рукой ,,, +5 короче;)
Отличная читалка.
Работает хорошо!
Наверное, самая лучшая читалка для GNU/Linux. По крайней мере, я лучше не встречал.
界面非常简洁，而且字典功能很细心。
ubuntu20.04.1系统中文，snap安装，打开Foliate全是口口口口口
每次书库里的书，都打不开，打开文件才可以
太喜欢这个风格了-干净简介-好用免费
summary: 太喜欢这个风格了-干净简介

description: Arch Gnome没有出现乱码问题，界面很简介好看。
